name: NYCTOPHOBIA (itch) (JR 01)
description:
Controls:

  • Click on Menus
  • WASD to move
  • Hold Shift to Run

Enter the Temple and survive against the monster created by your fears. The light will protect you on your progress, spread the light through the temple by activating beacons. You must make it through the temple and pass the trial.

This was a scrapped game from the beginning of 2020, and it's also my first gamejam game I've ever made. The game was too big to be finished within the gamejam time and many of the mechanics were broken from my inexperienced. So for 2021 Halloween, I thought it would be a good chance to fix up and share this failed game.

If there are any issues, or if the browser version isn't going well, then please try the downloadable version below!

Made for Winter Flowjam 2020

Art by BaronWasteland

Music from soundimage.org
